definition: "knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
limited term of imprisonment (i.e. anything less than life imprisonment)
abbr. for 刑事警察[xing2 shi4 jing3 cha2]/criminal police
to detain as criminal/criminal detention/abbr. for 刑事拘留[xing2 shi4 ju1 liu2]
to assess punishment/to determine the sentence (on a criminal)

sentences.english: The vanishment of Forfeiture of Property is an inexorable historical tr…
sentences.chinese: 沒收財產刑走向消亡是歷史的必然趨勢。

sentences.english: And meanwhile, the Laws should regulated the supervising of the execution of the penalty of property.
sentences.chinese: 同時，法律應明確規定對財產刑執行的檢察監督。

sentences.english: The representation of the non-confinement penalty policy to the guarantees of human rights to criminals is indirect.
sentences.chinese: 非監禁刑政策對罪犯人權保障的體現是間接的。

sentences.english: Law was initially a type of penalty, i.
Barry will cope with the sentence; he's done time before.
sentences.chinese: 巴里將能挺過這次刑期，他以前服過刑。

sentences.english: Jason was convicted of vehicular manslaughter for his little brother's death, and sent to state prison on a six-year sentence.
sentences.chinese: 傑森以交通肇事被起訴，被送到州監獄服六年刑。

sentences.english: You did a stretch in Cashman too?
Up till now, it is a fact that the non-imprisonment penalty has been wildly used in thedeveloped countries.
sentences.chinese: 到今天，非監禁刑的廣泛應用已成爲發達國家的現實。

sentences.english: Why are you interested in working in personnel department?
sentences.chinese: 你是對的，刑你爲什麼喜歡在人事工作？

sentences.english: Such a legal sentence is too light and is suspected of being indulgent with the degenerates.
sentences.chinese: 這一罪名的法定刑太輕，有放縱那些腐敗分子之嫌。

sentences.english: They bastinadoed the criminal on the soles of the feet and on the buttocks.
sentences.chinese: 他們對罪犯的腳掌施笞蹠刑和對其臀部施棒刑。

sentences.english: I think you need a good old-fashioned spanking and I'm going to give you one.
sentences.chinese: 我想你需要一個傳統風格的笞刑，我可以給你一個。

sentences.english: Death Penalty is the severest Punishment . It is widely used throughout the history .
sentences.chinese: 死刑是一種最爲嚴厲的生命刑，在歷史上多有適用。

sentences.english: At present, the judicial practice there have been a fine implementation of the anti-expansion is sentence.
sentences.chinese: 目前，司法實踐中出現了罰金刑執行反擴張現象。

sentences.english: Punishment of forfeiture has seldom been imposed and should be replaced by pecuniary penalty.
sentences.chinese: 沒收財產刑適用極少，應以罰金刑取代之。

sentences.english: Punishment of forfeiture has seldom been imposed and should be replaced by pecuniary penalty.
sentences.chinese: 沒收財產刑適用極少，應以罰金刑取代之。

definition: 11th earthly branch: 7-9 p.m., 9th solar month (8th October-6th November), year of the Dog/ancient Chinese compass point: 300°
see 屈戌兒|屈戌儿[qu1 qu5 er5]
12th earthly branch: 9-11 p.m., 10th solar month (7th November-6th December), year of the Boar/ancient Chinese compass point: 330°
Luhe district of Nanjing City 南京市 in Jiangsu 江蘇|江苏
the six directions (north, south, east, west, up, down)/the whole country/the universe/everything under the sun
to terminate/to cut short/to bring to a stop/to squeeze/to tighten/to damage/variant of 殺|杀[sha1]
ninth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/ninth in order/letter "I" or Roman "IX" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 345°/nona
fifth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/fifth in order/letter "E" or Roman "V" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/penta
6th earthly branch: 9-11 a.m., 4th solar month (5th May-5th June), year of the Snake/ancient Chinese compass point: 150°
Jinshui District of Zhengzhou City 鄭州市|郑州市[Zheng4 zhou1 Shi4], Henan
